about_the_game:
“Orientir” is an exciting adventure where you, as a young student, travel between two worlds: our real one and a parallel fictional one. The game immerses you in secret corners of parallel worlds where reality and mysticism merge into one. You are left almost alone in the unknown world, your only guide and assistant is a mysterious creature Lumy. The mental connection with Lumy is your bridge to the past and the key to your future. Together you start to explore another world inhabited by strange creatures and hiding many secrets. With each step, you delve deeper into the history of this place and make decisions which will affect the fate of the worlds and the balance between measurements.



Notes:

“Orientir” is not just a game, it's a portal to a world where each step can lead to a new discovery. Are you ready to break the secrets hidden in the shadow of mystical events?



Key features:

  • Exciting study: immerse yourself in detailed locations, from vast expanses to mysterious caves, each of which hides its secrets and unexplored creatures.
  • Innovative puzzles: solve unique and diverse puzzles that require not only intelligence, but also the use of a special camera trap to capture and explore mystical animals.
  • Dynamic plot: in the game, your choices and actions affect the development of the plot, opening new chapters of the story and character arcs.
  • Companion Lumy: develop the unique abilities of your companion, which will help you explore the new world and overcome obstacles.
  • Collecting and progression: collect all the mystical creatures, unleash their unique powers and use them to improve Lumy's abilities.
  • Survival and adaptation: manage your character's resources and skills to adapt to a changing world and overcome challenges in wild and unexplored places.
  • Mystic and reality: interaction with paranormal events and alternative measurements that blur the line between mystic and reality.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
